Package Models

Class Phase

java.lang.Object
Models.Phase
Direct Known Subclasses:
IssueOrderPhase, OrderExecutionPhase, StartUpPhase
public abstract class Phase extends Object
This abstract class declares abstract methods for each game phase

  • Constructor Summary

    • handleCommand

      public void handleCommand(String p_enterCommand, Player p_player) throws InvalidMap, InvalidCommand, IOException
      Method to handle all the commands related to manipulation of state
      Parameters:
      p_enterCommand - refers to command entered by the user in CLI
      p_player - refers to the player object
      Throws:
      InvalidMap - exception to handle invalid map
      InvalidCommand - exception to handle invalid command
      IOException - exception to handle invalid I/O
